All laws will need majority consent in order to be passed.Should the UK invoke UN Article 21 to reform to direct democracy now a new public voter website will be uploaded immediately, where all policies from all parties would be listed under their relevant searchable category and the arguments for and against any policy implementation will be provided on-line by its author and members from all of the current parties. People will be able to rate, comment and vote on policies and to submit their own policy ideas at any time.The website will be fully compliant with regards to web accessibility protocols and, with regards to the UK Disability Discrimination Act 1995.The most important policies [as rated by voters] will be submitted to the national vote for a limited time period and at the close of the voting period, the result would be implemented into law by the new parliamentary administration on behalf of the majority

For more information visit http://www.paparty.co.uk/
